actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: A bill to establish the U.S. Agency for World Peace within the Department of State.

summary.text: World Peace Agency Act - Establishes the United States Agency for World Peace within the Department of State. Provides that such Agency shall undertake studies of the economic, sociological and political causes of war. Establishes within the Agency a Laboratory for Peace which shall develop and administer the Agency's research and study programs. Provides that the Agency shall be headed by a Director to be appointed by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate. Grants the Agency necessary powers to carry out the objectives of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the U.S. Agency for World Peace within the Department of State.
